props.completeIcon: Icon to display when step is marked as completed
props.editIcon: Icon to display when step is editable
props.errorIcon: Icon to display when step has an error
props.rules: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`
props.step: Content to display inside step circle
